.. -*-rst-*-

========================
ClueMapperThemer History
========================

v0.6.2 (2008-06-07)
===================

  * Reworked configuration to use etc/cluemapper and var/cluemapper as
    basedirs.


v0.6.1 (2008-06-05)
===================

  * fixed css issue with external links

  * fixed typo for Deliverance (deliverance -> Deliverance)


v0.6 (2008-05-15)
=================

  * default theme can now be set via global_conf['cluemapper.defaulttheme']
